mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_attachment_refer where attachment_id_ in (select t.id_ from ujcms_attachment t where t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_attachment_refer (id_, attachment_id_, refer_type_, refer_id_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attachmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{referType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
